pkgmetadata.longdescription: hmaccalc can be used to compute HMAC (hash-based message authentication code) values for files. An HMAC is similar in concept to a message digest, except in that its calculation also incorporates a key which must be known to both the party generating the HMAC and the party verifying the HMAC.
